Title: Where do voters participate in the elections?
Designer: Office of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
Publisher: Zhongguo minzhu fazhi chubanshe (中国民主法制出版社)
Notes: Part of the series Elections of delegates from urban and rural districts for the new session of the National People's Congress (2011).It provides information on where voters participate, and how many candidates can be voted for: depending on its size, every electoral district elects one to three representatives.
Theme: Political ReformLegal KnowledgeElections of delegates from urban and rural districts for the new session of the National People's Congress (2011)
